name: GurgaonGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask Gurgaon Guide to give me a nice place to visit.”
”Alexa, tell Gurgaon Guide to recommend some fun places in Gurgaon.”
”Alexa, ask Gurgaon Guide what are some attractive places in Gurgaon.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gurgaon guide
des:
Visiting Gurgaon for the first time? Or even if your a resident but looking for new places to visit for the holidays, or over the weekend ? Well, don't worry ! 
GurgaonGuide ! provides you with all the great places within Gurgaon City. It recommends you places based on ratings and new places will be updated regularly.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
